entry.title: China's Xi Mimics Mao's Crisis Response in Sweeping Indoctrination Drive
entry.content: The intensity of the “spiritual baptism” campaign reflects the damage that the Chinese leader has sustained from the pandemic, the economy and U.S. tensions.

entry.title: Bakhmut Is Largely Under Russian Control, Says Ukrainian General
entry.content: The capture of the city would mark the only significant success of a monthslong Russian offensive that has severely depleted its military.

entry.title: Face Mask Mandates Fall Away Among Many Hospitals, Doctors
entry.content: Some of the last holdouts drop Covid-19 mask and test requirements after health and medical agencies roll back recommendations.
